title: Unspecified error occured on patch 7.2
body: Can someone help me fix this?

replies.body:
Unspecified errors can happen in a few different places during the patching process, but we most often see them pop up as a result of a *poor connection* to our patching servers. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) would be the best resource to reference at the moment, as the configurations it covers should resolve this error.

Let me know if this resolved the issue.
